description: Retrieves setting configurations for Inspector scans.

nested_items.name: ec2Configuration
nested_items.description: Specifies how the Amazon EC2 automated scan mode is currently configured for your environment.

nested_items.name: scanModeState
nested_items.description: An object that contains details about the state of the Amazon EC2 scan mode.

nested_items.name: scanMode
nested_items.description: The scan method that is applied to the instance.

nested_items.name: scanModeStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the Amazon EC2 scan mode setting.

nested_items.name: ecrConfiguration
nested_items.description: Specifies how the ECR automated re-scan duration is currently configured for your environment.

nested_items.name: rescanDurationState
nested_items.description: An object that contains details about the state of the ECR re-scan settings.

nested_items.name: pullDateRescanDuration
nested_items.description: The rescan duration configured for image pull date.

nested_items.name: rescanDuration
nested_items.description: The rescan duration configured for image push date.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of changes to the ECR automated re-scan duration.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp representing when the last time the ECR scan duration setting was changed.
